title: Phone not charging, internal short circuit, high current usage when the charger is plugged
content:
My Google Pixel 2 XL phone not charging anymore... when I put the charger cable i saw some smoke and had burnt smell...
I already tried almost everything... Safe mode.. shut down during 1 day... reboot ... etc. etc..
Finally today I checked with a usb power meter and when I plug the cable the connector become very hot,it smells like a electrical burn and the current is more than 3A !
I think the internal charging circuit is shorted.
I had all Nexus phones... then Pixel phones.. always troubles always problems.
And I think google don't care about the warranty things because there's no any web page about how send back the phone for a replacement !!!
no Chat button on my phone Help page (Settings -> Help)
My phone is dead and i don't know what I can do to replace it..
